title: Playify
description: Playify is a prototype, aiming to assist users in learning how to play the guitar. The technical foundation of this app involves the integration of a WebAssembly (WASM) Rust library, which computes the Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) using the Harmonic Product Spectrum technique. Additionally, a dynamic SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) generator is employed to create and update guitar tabs in real-time.
